title: fix: align gemini-search registry with actual model
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updates the gemini-search registry to correctly identify the underlying model as gemini-2.5-flash-lite and reflects the lower pricing structure.
gist.impact: Ensures accurate model reporting and displays the reduced cost of $0.10/$0.40 per million tokens for users.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the 8-bit bee mascot adjusting a digital price tag on a glowing gemini crystal. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
